member.name: T:Day_1.Employee
member.summary: represents an employee with properties such as Id, Salary, SecurityLevel, Hiring date and Gender. implements the IComparable interface to allow for sorting based on the hiring date.

member.name: P:Day_1.Employee.SecurityLevel
member.summary: is an enumeration that defines different security privileges for employees. which allows for multiple privileges to be assigned to a single employee by combining the values using bitwise operations.

member.name: P:Day_1.Employee.Gender
member.summary: is an enumeration that defines different types of gender

member.name: M:Day_1.Employee.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: this is the implementation of the CompareTo method from the IComparable interface. to compare the current employee object with another object based on their hiring date.

member.name: M:Day_1.Employee.ToString
member.summary: this is an override of the ToString method to provide a string representation of the employee object.
